document.full_text: a sri lankan-born tamil has been questioned in norway as part of a dutch probe into extortion by the tamil tigers and sri lankan media on friday identified him as the leader of one the defeated separatist group's most powerful remaining factions.
document.title: tamil tiger faction head questioned in norway-sri lankan media
lines_and_colors: a sri lankan-born tamil has been questioned in norway as part of a dutch probe into extortion by the tamil tigers and sri lankan media on friday identified him as the leader of one the defeated separatist group's most powerful remaining factions.
